mapper.sql: ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, USERTYPE, LOCKED, ROLEIDS
mapper.insert: insert into user (ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, USERTYPE, LOCKED, ROLEIDS) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType, javaType=com.kyh.model.enums.UserType}, #{locked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update user
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERTYPE = #{userType,javaType=com.kyh.model.enums.UserType},

ROLEIDS = #{roleIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
